channel.title: Hobbies on Evan Zhou
channel.description: Recent content in Hobbies on Evan Zhou

item.title: Music
item.description: Piano: 5 yrs Violin: 8 yrs Voice: 1 yr Currently I mostly practice voice, but my time with music has taught me what it means to have dedicated and focused practice. Music for me is a way to connect with others, a way to appreciate culture, and a way to communicate emotion. Most importantly, it’s fun to create music with others and share that with the audience! I’m currently a part of the Pitt Men’s Glee Club, and their small group the Pantherhythms.
